item.title: Sydney Harbour Bridge Climb
item.author: @huatuostudio
item.description: John has given me ticket for a full 3 hours Sydney Harbour Bridge Climb for my birthday this year (thank you John!! 💕 ). I have to say that I always thought the climb was an overpriced tourist thing so I have never done it. Nevertheless, I was excited to wake up at 3am (I’ve hardly slept!) to get ready for the climb. We were very lucky that we were in a 5 people only group, comparing with the usual 10-15 people groups.
